WeaponData
{
	// default viewmodel fov (overloads "viewmodel_fov" in weapon scripts)
	"defaultfov_viewmodel"			"65"
	"defaultfov_viewmodel_ironsight"	"65"

	// a multipler on top of the effective range
	// to work out max range for tracelines
	"maxrange_mod"		"1.5"

	// modifers for the effective range of the weapon
	"accuracy_mod"			"1.0"
	"accuracy_mod_ironsights"	"2.0"

	// how much to exaggerate the angles
	// generated by - atan( 1.0f / ( range * angle_exaggeration ) ) )
	"angle_exaggeration"		"1"

	// the basic recoil amounts are fiddled with by the
	// recoil mod's to form the right amount of recoil
	// for the right situation

	// basic recoil amounts
	"recoil_x_min"		"-3.0"
	"recoil_x_max"		"-1.0"
	"recoil_y_min"		"-1.0"
	"recoil_y_max"		 "0.0"

	// basic recoil amounts when deployed with a bipod
	"recoil_x_min_bipod"	"0.0"
	"recoil_x_max_bipod"	"-1.5"
	"recoil_y_min_bipod"	"-0.5"
	"recoil_y_max_bipod"	"0.0"

	// recoil mod
	"recoilmod_ironsights" 			"0.80"	// stances in ironsights

	"recoilmod_running" 			"1.75"	// moving
	"recoilmod_running_ironsights" 		"1.40"	// moving ironsights

	"recoilmod_crouch" 			"0.90" 	// stances
	"recoilmod_crouch_ironsights" 		"0.70"

	"recoilmod_crouch_running" 		"1.50"
	"recoilmod_crouch_running_ironsights" 	"1.20"

	"recoilmod_prone" 			"0.80"
	"recoilmod_prone_ironsights" 		"0.50"

	// modifers for the push (which is pushing the weapon up)
	// and decay (which is putting it up but then it coming down again)
	// for each situation
	"recoilmod_push"			"0.4"
	"recoilmod_decay"			"0.2"
	"recoilmod_push_ironsights"		"0.2"
	"recoilmod_decay_ironsights"		"0.1"

	// punch is the weapon shaking around
	// and the decay length is the length of the decay
	// reset is how hard the reset for decay will be
	"recoilmod_bipod_punch"			"0.2"
	"recoilmod_bipod_decay_length"		"0.5"
	"recoilmod_bipod_decay_reset"		"10"

	// shakiness defines the radius of the shake
	// will only 'shake' in ironsights when has lowstamina, moving or in bipod
	"shakiness"				"0.50"
	"shakiness_ironsights"			"0.20"
	"shakiness_crouched"			"0.20"
	"shakiness_crouched_ironsights"		"0.10"
	"shakiness_proned"			"0.10"
	"shakiness_proned_ironsights"		"0.05"

	// make sure the following values decrease in size
	// please note, tell pongles if you raise these values!!!!
	"shakefactor_lowstamina"		"3.50"
	"shakefactor_wounded"			"2.50"
	"shakefactor_moving"			"2.00"
	"shakefactor_ishold"			"1.10"

	// seconds before the ironsights twitch
	"shakefactor_isholdtime"		"15"

	// fireaim
	"freeaim_distance"			"12"
	"freeaim_screenweapon_relation"		"0.85"

	// stance offsets
	"vmoffset_stand_move_x"			"0.25"
	"vmoffset_stand_move_y"			"0.25"
	"vmoffset_stand_move_z"			"1.00"

	"vmoffset_crouch_x"			"0.25"
	"vmoffset_crouch_y"			"0.25"
	"vmoffset_crouch_z"			"0.75"

	"vmoffset_crouch_move_x"		"0.35"
	"vmoffset_crouch_move_y"		"0.35"
	"vmoffset_crouch_move_z"		"1.25"

	"vmoffset_prone_x"			"0.35"
	"vmoffset_prone_y"			"0.35"
	"vmoffset_prone_z"			"1.25"

	// damage scale
	"damage_scale"				"0.04"
}
